pullrequest.title: Joint control menu read current values

content.raw: I have renamed the service and topic using `GetScopedName`. I noticed that one of the unit tests now fails though because `GetScopedName` returns "" for the dummy models in the unit tests, which results in an invalid service name. This happens because the `scopedName` field is not initialized by default while the `name` field is initialized to "\_\_default\_\_". You must call `Load` or `SetName` which in turn call `ComputeScopedName`. Should I modify the joint controller to handle empty model names? Alternatively, should the base class initialize scopedName to something? What do you think?
content.html: I have renamed the service and topic using GetScopedName. I noticed that one of the unit tests now fails though because GetScopedName returns "" for the dummy models in the unit tests, which results in an invalid service name. This happens because the scopedName field is not initialized by default while the name field is initialized to "__default__". You must call Load or SetName which in turn call ComputeScopedName. Should I modify the joint controller to handle empty model names? Alternatively, should the base class initialize scopedName to something? What do you think?
